duties_responsibilities.duty: Translate business requirements and functional specifications into software solutions.
Lead projects involving application development using Java and Springboot frameworks.
Assist with application design and web deployment.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues in the development and application support environment.
Support integration and user acceptance testing.
Build and maintain relationships with internal customers and third-party vendors.
Review and validate technical specifications and documentation.
Develop and execute unit testing and write technical documentation.
Mentor and train other technical resources.
Participate in all software development lifecycle phases.
Maintain specialist knowledge of database concepts and data modeling techniques.
Ensure data accessibility, retrievability, and security.
Manipulate specific data to satisfy information needs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, CIS, or related field (Master's preferred)
